message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great product for $10,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $8,000 for it. Could we possibly come to an agreement at this price?
Bob, I understand your position, but I can't sell it for less than $9,200.  This product is highly sought after, and I'm confident it's worth the investment.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I've carefully considered the value of the product, but I still believe that $8,000 would be a fair price. Could we perhaps reach an agreement at this amount?
